description:
Invoice required for Final Year Diploma Engineering Project.

Project Title:
AI Powered Report and Invoice Generator System

Project Scope Includes:
- Design and development of AI-based report generation system
- Automated invoice generation in JSON and PDF formats
- Drag-and-drop support for PDF and JSON files
- Multiple report and invoice templates (Academic, Business, Technical)
- History management with delete functionality
- User-friendly interface using Streamlit
- Secure file handling and data storage

Technology Used:
- Python programming language
- Streamlit framework for frontend
- ReportLab library for PDF generation
- JSON for structured invoice data

Purpose of Invoice:
Academic project submission and evaluation.

Amount Details:
Base amount ₹8000
GST 18%
Total payable ₹9440

Payment Status:
Pending
